name: Shadow of Jimmy: Devourer of Worlds
name_original: Shadow of Jimmy: Devourer of Worlds
description:
Swing, grapple, and parkour your way around an otherworldly arena to defeat an ancient evil: Jimmy, the Devourer of Worlds! Use your grappling and wallrunning skills to scale each tentacle and strike Jimmy in the eyes, before delivering the coup de grace on the great central eye within Jimmy's maw.

The game is not yet fully functional, as there is no win or lose condition, and not all features are implemented. However, swinging, wallrunning, and sliding around the arena is still a ton of fun!

Made for the UMD Game Developers Club Spring 2023 Game Jam. The themes of the jam were Bootleg and Existential Crisis.
